map

    • Map tree tags for fieldwork

Reference version 0.0.00.9008

Utils

add_status_tree

Define the status of a tree based on the status of its stems.

check_crucial_names

Check if an object contains specific names.

check_unique check_unique_vector

Report if a vector or a variable of a dataframe is duplicated.

exists_in_pkg

Test if an object exists in the namespace of a package.

rm_dead_twice

Remove trees found dead in both the last and previous last censuses.

top

Filter a data set by matching n values from the head (or tail) of a variable.

Datasets

one_quadrat four_quadrats

Data sets for examples; adapted from bciex::bci12vft_mini.

Main functions

map_quad

Map trees within a quadrat.

map_sp

Map the distribution of one, some or all species in a census data set.

map_tag

Map tree tags by status, showing four subquadrats per plot-page.

Helpers

add_subquadrat

Add a quadrat variable to a dataframe based based on qx and qy coordinates.

map_tag_header map_quad_header

Pre-made headers.

tag_dead

Add the ending ".d" to the Tag of dead stems.

theme_map_tag theme_map_quad

Themes.
